title: PlayStation Loses its Wolverine Director to Xbox - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.31.24
description:
New World Aeternum is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC! Get it here: https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Phasmophobia is out now PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Buy it now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673 
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010 

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - Mike’s Resident Evil 4 Review
 - The STREAM is a sponsored Dragon Age The Veilguard 
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:25 - Housekeeping
             -  The Roper Report   -
00:10:02 - PlayStation's Wolverine creative director is now leading Xbox’s Perfect Dark
00:22:20 -  Nintendo made a music streaming app for Switch Online subscribers
00:37:30 - ‘Call of Duty: Black Ops 6’ Scores Franchise’s Biggest-Ever Launch Weekend, Microsoft Gaming Says
00:43:06 - Outlast is getting a movie adaptation from Saw studio Lionsgate - Matt Wales
00:48:47 - Wee News!
00:52:23 - SuperChats
00:58:02 - You‘re Wrong
